lead_paragraph: American Pharoah came into the Derby off rousing wins in two races in Arkansas, then won the Derby as the favorite and went on to become racing’s first Triple Crown winner in 37 years.

headline.main: Nyquist Follows in Path of American Pharoah
headline.print_headline: Young Colt Follows In the Path Of Pharoah

snippet: American Pharoah came into the Derby off rousing wins in two races in Arkansas, then won the Derby as the favorite and went on to become racing’s first Triple Crown winner in 37 years.
